system.description:
You have a stronger-than-normal focus on the elements than a normal druid (or perhaps a stronger focus on the natural world than a typical elementalist) but the two traditions are fundamentally complimentary. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain a +1 bonus to your Wisdom score, to a maximum value of 20. You may change your Elementalist spellcasting ability to Wisdom if it is something else. Once made, this choice is permanent.
  • You learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.tn41akceteoog5c2]{Elemental Manipulation} cantrip, which does not count against your druid cantrips known. If you already know it, you may select another druid cantrip from the air, cold, earth, fire, lightning, or water school instead.
  • Half of your druid levels count as elementalist levels for the purpose of determining how much damage your Elemental Blast does.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in druid, 3 levels in elementalist
